content: **knitted jumper for dog in drops merino extra fine the piece is worked top down with stripes sizes xs - m ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern me-246 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** xs - s - m examples of breeds xs = chihuahua s = bichon frisé m = cocker spaniel dog s measurements chest approx 28/32 - 38/42 - 48/52 cm back-length without the ribbing at the neck approx 24 - 32 - 40 cm **materials** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100-150 g colour 40 powder pink 50-50-50 g colour 45 blush drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm **knitting gauge** 22 stitches in width and 30 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
